name: Monster Dentist (itch) (Tinned Tomatoes)
description:
Monster Dentist

is a reinterpreted Breakout clone that I made as part of a Unity course at udemy. I invested some extra time to produce the artwork and music. It's a HTML5/WebGL build and still a prototype.

You get: loads of teeth, 3 different level, just 1 ball. Hey, and a fullscreen mode, too! If you like the music you can also listen to it at SoundCloud.
